Uses of Interface
ch.phonon.drawables.Drawable

  • Packages that use Drawable 
    Package Description
    ch.phonon  
    ch.phonon.drawables  

    • Uses of Drawable in ch.phonon

      Methods in ch.phonon that return types with arguments of type Drawable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Drawable> TEMAllied.getDrawables()
      Get all Drawable associated to this TEMAllied.
      Methods in ch.phonon with parameters of type Drawable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TEMAllied.addDrawable(Drawable drawable)
      Adds an additional Drawable to the list of Drawables that should be plotted on top of the TEM picture.
      Method parameters in ch.phonon with type arguments of type Drawable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TEMAllied.setDrawableList(java.util.ArrayList<Drawable> drawableList)
      Set a List of drawables to be associated with the loaded TEM picture

    • Uses of Drawable in ch.phonon.drawables

      Classes in ch.phonon.drawables that implement Drawable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractDrawable
      This abstract class implements some standard methods, that can be used by any Drawable implementation.
      class  DrawableBox
      The DrawableBox class implements the AbstractDrawable.
      class  DrawableCircle
      The DrawableCircle is a Drawable object representing a circle.
      class  DrawableCircularStar
      This star is a DrawableComposite, that may represent a mathematical point in space.
      class  DrawableComposite
      The DrawableComposite class allows to group Drawables to one Drawable, what allows to construct more complex shapes.
      class  DrawableCoordinateSystem
      The DrawableCoordinateSystem class draws a static coordinate system of the picture.
      class  DrawableDiamondStar
      This star is a DrawableComposite, that may represents a mathematical point in space.
      class  DrawableLine
      The DrawableLine is a Drawable object representing a line.
      class  DrawablePicture
      The DrawablePicture class provides a Drawable picture, that can be drawn like other Drawables.
      class  DrawablePoint
      The DrawablePoint is a drawable item (a Drawable) that is additionally associated with a position in picture coordinates.
      class  DrawableScaleReference
      The DrawableScaleReference is a complex interactively used Drawable, that represents a scale to measure distances in pixel (picture coordinates) in a given graphical context.
      class  DrawableStar
      This star is a DrawableComposite, that may represents a mathematical point in space.
      class  DrawableText
      The DrawableText class is used to place text items to the TEMView.
      Methods in ch.phonon.drawables that return Drawable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Drawable DrawablePoint.getDrawable()
      This method gives back the reference of the associated Drawable item.
      Methods in ch.phonon.drawables with parameters of type Drawable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void DrawableComposite.add(Drawable drawable)
      This method is used to add Drawables to the DrawableComposite.
      void DrawableComposite.remove(Drawable drawable)
      Deprecated. 
      void DrawablePoint.setDrawable(Drawable drawable)
      This method associates a new Drawable item
      Constructors in ch.phonon.drawables with parameters of type Drawable 
      Constructor and Description
      DrawablePoint(Drawable drawable, java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double point)
      The constructor constructs a DrawablePoint by associating the drawable with the point in picture coordinate.
